articles.author: Jennifer Hansler
articles.title: First US government-organized convoy evacuates private American citizens from Sudan conflict - CNN
articles.description: The first US-led effort to evacuate private American citizens from the conflict in Sudan was completed Saturday, with a convoy organized by the US government reaching Port Sudan after a long journey from Khartoum.
articles.content: The first US-led effort to evacuate private American citizens from the conflict in Sudan was completed Saturday, with a convoy organized by the US government reaching Port Sudan after a long journey … [+4855 chars]

articles.author: Michael Wayland
articles.title: Why GM is killing the Chevy Bolt — America's cheapest EV — amid record sales - CNBC
articles.description: To reach stated EV goals, GM needs the production capacity, profits and market positioning of its next-generation EVs. It doesn't believe it needs the Bolt.
articles.content:
A Chevrolet Bolt EUV on display at the New York Auto Show, April 13, 2022.

articles.title: Popular diets may increase risk of heart disease, American Heart Association says - CBS News
articles.description: Some popular diet trends, including the keto and paleo diets, may have an adverse effect on heart health, a new statement from the American Heart Association...
